page.title: 03Interview with our Vicar
page.content: We interviewed Rev. Condry the vicar of Bloxham.Our first question was what happens at the church?We have services on Wednesday mornings and Sundays,about six come on Wednesdays and 50-80 come on Sundays.I think the church is a bit under used.We have Bellringing and choir pratice in the church.People think the church is rather gloomy & I wear very dark and gloomy clothes.We have 8 bells the largest is 200lb.The vicarage was built in 1959.The spire is 198 feet high.I come to do assembly on Monday mornings which is hectic.We wear black shirts with a tunnel,the tunnel is where you put the white plastic. People come to church when they are about 11 then stop when they are about 13 then start coming again when they are about 30-40.The Church is a very big building,the biggest in the village.
